text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in Confidentiality
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-Confidentiality

name: SecurityClassificationObservationValue
title: SecurityClassificationObservationValue
description: Security observation values used to indicate security classification metadata.
